body_html:
I should also address the comparison between this PR and the inclusion of Swish.

Swish is simple and very easy for users of pytorch to implement themselves. Aggmo is also simple but has a little more mechanical work to interface with the Optimizer class. Assuming a user is interested in either method, I think it is more useful to have the optimizer implementation included than this particular activation function.

body:
I should also address the comparison between this PR and the inclusion of Swish.

Swish is simple and very easy for users of pytorch to implement themselves. Aggmo is also simple but has a little more mechanical work to interface with the Optimizer class. Assuming a user is interested in either method, I think it is more useful to have the optimizer implementation included than this particular activation function.
